version_description:
Bug fix. We will keep working on this app.
Sorry again.

Sorry, but we are still fixing bugs.
----2.0.6----
Fixed manual sorting problem.
Fixed Apple Watch syncing problem.
Fixed other problems.
Improved UI a bit.

Fixed manual sorting problem.
Improved cloud sync.
Made the tutorial easy to understand.
Fixed some other bugs.
If you have any question, send it to davetech@163.com

----What's New----
Added iOS 11 support.
Detecting time in phrase and automaticly add reminder for you.
You can now use voice as input method. (dictation language can be changed in setting)
We also fixed some bugs and improved stability.

----What's New----
Added iOS 11 support.
Fixed some bugs.

Added support for iPhone X.
Added new feature to share list with others.
Added support for TouchID & FaceID.
Improved cloud syncing a lot.
Fixed some bugs.
*If you saw deplicates , use your main device to reset cloud data once will fix it.*

Added support for iPhone X.
Added new feature to share list with others.(Share link must be opened in Safari)
Added support for TouchID & FaceID.
Improved cloud syncing a lot.
Fixed some bugs.
*If you saw deplicates , use your main device to reset cloud data once will fix it.*

Fixed bugs from last update.
Added support for iPhone X.
Added new feature to share list with others.(Share link must be opened in Safari)
Added support for TouchID & FaceID.
Improved cloud syncing a lot.
*If you saw deplicates , use your main device to reset cloud data once will fix it.*

Fixed some bugs.
Added support for iPhone X.
Added new feature to share list with others. (Share link must be opened in Safari, cloud sync need to be on)
Added support for TouchID & FaceID.
Improved cloud syncing a lot.
*If you saw deplicates , use your main device to reset cloud data once will fix it.*

Fixed some bugs.
Added support for iPhone X.
Added new feature to share list with others. (Share link must be opened in Safari)
Added support for TouchID & FaceID.
Improved cloud syncing a lot.
*If you saw deplicates , use your main device to reset cloud data once will fix it.*

Fixed some bugs.

-----Recent Update-----
Added support for iPhone X and FaceID.

Fixed some bugs.

-----Recent Update-----
Added support for iPhone X and FaceID.
Added shared lists and more.

Fixed some bugs.

-----Recent Update-----
Added support for iPhone X and FaceID.
Added shared lists and more.

Fixed cloud sync issues
Added list-in-wallpaper (you can hide your list in a live wallpaper)
Added copy to clipboard
Added list reorder ability (hold and drag)
Improved cloud sync a lot
Added option to confirm before deleting.
Fixed some bugs.
Fixed some UI issues on iPhone X.
-----Recent Update-----
Added support for iPhone X and FaceID.
Added shared lists and more.

Happy iOS 13, enjoy it.
- optmized for iOS 13
- added support for auto theme (white or black)
- added medium priority
- fixed a few bugs

Recent update:
- added a simple mode for list view (shows only list name instead of snapshot)
- added stat data for today
- other improvement
Previous update:
- Fixed a bug that stops moving tasks to another list
- You can set priority while adding tasks in today widget
If you have any issue, plz contact us using in-app feedback or send us an email: davetech.app@gmail.com
If your list suddenly becomes empty, turn off cloud sync then turn on again.

This update:
- Fixed a few bugs
- You can set priority while adding tasks in today widget
Recent updates:
- Added support for Russian language
- Added priority: you can now set priority for tasks, so they will always be at top. (To use priority, make sure all your devices are up-to-date)
- Added auto-snooze: by defaul it will trigger 3 times, every 10 minutes; you can change it in setting - more option
- Added repeat without notification: you can turn off notification for a repeated task now
If you have any issue, plz contact us using in-app feedback or send us an email: davetech.app@gmail.com
If your list suddenly becomes empty, turn off cloud sync then turn on again.

This update:
- Fixed bugs on iOS 13
Recent updates:
- Added support for Russian language
- Added url scheme to open a list: minimalist://x-callback-url/open?list=listName
- Fixed watch compication issue
- Fixed live wallpaper red star issue
- Added priority: you can now set priority for tasks, so they will always be at top. (To use priority, make sure all your devices are up-to-date)
- Added auto-snooze: by defaul it will trigger 3 times, every 10 minutes; you can change it in setting - more option
- Added repeat without notification: you can turn off notification for a repeated task now
- Added simple in-app feedback
If you have any issue, plz contact us first. Either using in-app feedback or send us an email: davetech.app@gmail.com
If your list suddenly becomes empty, turn off cloud sync then turn on again.

This update:
- Improved stability
Recent updates:
- Added support for Italian and Spanish. (if you see improper translation, plz let us know, we will fix it.)
- Added simple in-app feedback

If you have any issue, plz contact us first. Either using in-app feedback or send us an email: davetech.app@gmail.com

Mac version is available now in Mac app store.
----this versions----
- Added ability to minimize focus time
- Added support for URL Scheme （minimalist://x-callback-url/create?list=valueList&content=valueContent&date=yyyy-mm-dd&time=HH:mm&x-success=valueCallback valueList and valueContent must be url encoded first,valueCallback is the callback app's url scheme name)
- Fixed a custom monthly repeat problem
- Other minor improvement
----previous----
- Added option to set list specifc sorting (in multiple list view, tap "..." button.)
- Added silent notification for focus timer (useful in a library)
- Added new Continuous Reminder - only stops when task is completed (Notification action, force touch on your notification - where you snooze a reminder)
- Added option to set badge number for selected lists
- You can now use 3D (force) touch to acess multiple list view (you need to turn it on in setting - more options)

-----Recent Update-----
- Fixed a few bugs
- Added shared lists and more
- Added option to show list title
- Added list specific ringtone
- Added list-in-wallpaper (you can hide your list in a live wallpaper)
- Added copy to clipboard
- Added list reorder ability (hold and drag)
- Added option to confirm before deleting.
- Added support for iPhone X and FaceID
- Fixed some UI issues on iPhone X

- Fixed a few bugs
- Added repeated location reminder

- Fixed some UI issues on iPhone X

MinimaList 2.4 is packed with new features and optimized for iOS 12 and new iPhones, including support for Siri Shortcuts.
---- New features ----
• Siri Shortcuts - take advantage of Siri Shortcuts to boost your productivity
• Custom fonts - change the font weight, size and import your own fonts
• Custom theme - choose any color for background and font
• Haptic feedback - haptic feedback for supported devices (setting - other option)
• New focus mode - pomodoro, countdown or timer, your choice
• More repeat intervals - repeat by selected days of week, month ...etc
• Improved cloud sync - now cloud sync works better
• New Stat view - redesigned statics view
• Export your data
• Added two new app icons
• Other improvements and bug fixes

------Mac app-------
We are testing Mac app, if you want to help, contact us: davetech.app@gmail.com

IMPORTANT: If you didn't update to 2.4, DON'T UPDATE NOW, there are some critical bugs if you are not new users.
We apologize for this bad experience. It is all our fault, we are SORRY.
This version fixed a few bugs, but we are still working on some critical ones, don't reinstall if this version still didn't fix your problem. we are working hard to fix them.
Remember, if this one didn't fix your problem, plz be patient for next one. This may take a while.

First of all, we want to say SORRY for everyone, since version 2.4 we brought too many bugs, that is unaccecptable. We just want to fix bugs as fast as we can, but sadly after fixing one, sometimes it just brought a new one. We hope this one will fix most bugs. And thanks a lot for still suporting us. Contact us anytime: davetech.app@gmail.com
- In setting - other option, you can restore tasks from auto backup
- Fixed issue that always opens the first list
- Fixed crashing bug
- Fixed a bug that sometimes causes tasks got lost after closing the app
- Improved cloud sync
- Fixed a few minor issues
- Improved Siri functions
- Double tap time picker can change to 5 min interval

• Other improvements and bug fixes

Good news, Mac version will be available on Dec 5, get ready for it.
- You can now use 3D (force) touch to acess multiple list view
- You can now set "from/to" for calendar and reminders sync
- Fixed some issues for custom repeated tasks
- In setting - other option, you can restore tasks from auto backup if you lost some of your list
- Fixed crashing bug
- Fixed a bug that sometimes causes tasks got lost after closing the app
- Improved cloud sync
- Fixed a few minor issues
- Improved Siri functions
- Double tap time picker can change to 5 min interval
MinimaList 2.4 is packed with new features and optimized for iOS 12 and new iPhones, including support for Siri Shortcuts.
---- New features ----
• Siri Shortcuts - take advantage of Siri Shortcuts to boost your productivity
• Custom fonts - change the font weight, size and import your own fonts
• Custom theme - choose any color for background and font
• Haptic feedback - haptic feedback for supported devices (setting - other option)
• New focus mode - pomodoro, countdown or timer, your choice
• More repeat intervals - repeat by selected days of week, month ...etc
• Improved cloud sync - now cloud sync works better
• New Stat view - redesigned statics view
• Export your data
• Added two new app icons
• sync with reminders
• Other improvements and bug fixes

Mac version is available now in Mac app store.
----this versions----
- Added ability to minimize focus time
- Added support for URL Scheme （minimalist://x-callback-url/create?list=valueList&content=valueContent&date=yyyy-mm-dd&time=HH:mm&x-success=valueCallback valueList and valueContent must be url encoded first,valueCallback is the callback app's url scheme name)
- Fixed a custom monthly repeat problem
- Other minor improvement
----previous----
- Added option to set list specifc sorting (in multiple list view, tap "..." button.)
- Added silent notification for focus timer (useful in a library)
- Added new Continuous Reminder - only stops when task is completed (Notification action, force touch on your notification - where you snooze a reminder)
- Added option to set badge number for selected lists
- You can now use 3D (force) touch to acess multiple list view (you need to turn it on in setting - more options)
